patthana15.74:4.1: Saraṇaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.74:5.1: Araṇaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naaraṇo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.74:5.2: Araṇaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasaraṇo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.74:5.3: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana15.74:6.1: Araṇaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
